  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3018</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Online-Exhibitions - It came from Within -70 years since Krystallnacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Online-Ausstellungen - es kam von innerhalb -70 
Jahren seit Krystallnacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En ligne-Expositions - il est venu de dans un 
délai de -70 ans depuis Krystallnacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em linha-online-Exhibitions - veio dentro de -70 
anos desde Krystallnacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In linea-Mostre - è venuto da parte di -70 anni 
da Krystallnacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε απευθείας σύνδεση-εκθέσεις - ήρθε από μέσα από 
-70 έτη από Krystallnacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En li'nea-Exposiciones - vino a partir en el 
plazo de de -70 años desde Krystallnacht</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This multimedia presentation which includes, images, videos and testimonial documents is a remarkable presentation of the events of which occurred on November 9, 1938, what came to be called Kristallnacht ("Night of the Broken Glass")The site provides an informative and experiential context to the events surrounding Kristallnacht</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Kristallnacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">riots</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">concentration camps</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Germany Austria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Nazis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">exhibition</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Multimediadarstellung, der einschließt, 
Bilder, videos und testimonial Dokumente ist eine bemerkenswerte 
Darstellung der Fälle, von denen an November 9 auftrat, 1938, was 
kam, genannt zu werden Kristallnacht ("Nacht der unterbrochenen 
Glass")The Sites stellt einen informativen und erfahrungsmäßigen 
Kontext zu den Fällen zur Verfügung, die Kristallnacht umgeben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette présentation de multimédia qui inclut, 
images, videos et documents testimoniaux est une présentation 
remarquable des événements desquels s'est produit 9 novembre 1938, 
ce qui est venu pour s'appeler Kristallnacht (la "nuit du site cassé 
de Glass")The fournit un contexte instructif et empirique aux 
événements entourant Kristallnacht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta apresentação dos multimedia que inclui, as
imagens, os videos e os originais testimonial são uma apresentação 
notável dos eventos de que ocorreu novembro em 9, 1938, o que veio 
ser chamado Kristallnacht (a "noite do local quebrado de Glass")The 
fornece um contexto informative e experiential aos eventos que cercam 
Kristallnacht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa presentazione di multimedia che include, 
le immagini, i videos ed i documenti testimonial è una presentazione 
notevole degli eventi di cui si è presentato il 9 novembre 1938, che 
cosa è venuto essere chiamato Kristallnacht ("la notte del luogo 
rotto di Glass")The fornisce un contesto informativo ed empirico agli 
eventi che circondano Kristallnacht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η παρουσίαση πολυμέσων που περιλαμβάνουν, οι 
εικόνες, τα βίντεο και τα πιστοποιητικά έγγραφα είναι μια 
αξιοπρόσεκτη παρουσίαση των γεγονότων των οποίων εμφανίστηκε στις
9 Νοεμβρίου ..1938, τι ήρθε να κληθεί Kristallnacht ("η 
νύχτα της σπασμένης περιοχής Glass")The παρέχει ένα 
πληροφοριακό και εμπειρικό πλαίσιο στα γεγονότα που περιβάλλουν 
Kristallnacht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta presentación de las multimedias que 
incluye, las imágenes, los videos y los documentos testimonial es una
presentación notable de los acontecimientos de los cuales ocurrió de
noviembre el 9 de 1938, qué vino ser llamada Kristallnacht (la "noche
del sitio quebrado de Glass")The proporciona a un contexto informativo
y experimental a los acontecimientos que rodean Kristallnacht</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
